title: Failed transfer
content: If a transfer failed, verify balance, recipient number, and network status. If funds were deducted but the recipient did not receive, escalate with transaction reference.

title: Sent to wrong number
content: If sent to the wrong number, act quickly. Check if reversal is possible based on provider policy. Gather transaction ID, time, and recipient number for escalation.

title: Pending transfer
content: Pending transfers may resolve automatically. If pending beyond expected time, gather transaction reference and escalate.

title: Cashout / agent help
content: For cashout issues, confirm agent availability and float. For failed cashouts, collect the transaction reference and escalate.
